core.name: Make Your Getaway Red Floral Print Maxi Dress
description: Oh, there are so many incredible movie-esque scenarios that I contemplated setting this scene with. Great moments of tension and excitement, bravery and a dash of careless passion! But in the end, I trusted my gut and decided that ultimately, it's going to be better if you imagine it yourself--created from scratch. Your mind is going to come up with the absolute best situation possible, the perfect scene. So what's it going to be? What would it be like to Make Your Getaway? And what are you getting away from? The corporate world? The daily routine of seeing the same four walls of your house? Maybe seeing the same town you've seen for way too many years? It's all up to you ... and this darling maxi dress, of course. Maxi dress features a v-neckline with adjustable ruffle straps (up to 2.5"). Skirt has an invisible back zipper and two slits. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

title: Make Your Getaway Red Floral Print Maxi Dress

core.name: Caught In A Reverie Red Lace Dress
description: As wondrous as life can be at its best, there are an equal number of times when it can be dull as dirt. Thank goodness for your active imagination, because you can while away the hours with the most rewarding of daydreams. A bit of advice though, if we may: dress as though you expect something exciting to happen at any moment, even at the height of your boredom. You don’t want to be caught in a reverie, unprepared to make your daydreams a reality when opportunity strikes. This lace dress is versatile in that way, and stunning to boot. Model is wearing a small. • 70% Cotton 30% Polyester • Lining 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

title: Caught In A Reverie Red Lace Dress

core.name: Two Become One Red Lace Dress
description: When it comes to white lace, how’s a girl supposed to wear it and not immediately think of a fairy tale wedding? At some point in all of our lives we’ve dreamed about it (though some of us hold onto that dream longer than others). But as enticing as the promise of “Two Become One” is, white lace has a far more practical, and far more effective purpose—making you look your most beautiful, no matter the occasion. Bodycon style dress features a red crochet lace overlay with a peek-a-boo midriff and plunging neckline. Dress has a slight stretch and features a v back with peek-a-boo panels and an invisible back zipper. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

core.name: With All My Heart Red Dress
description: Dear Ex-boyfriend, I bought a new dress online the other day. It has precisely the shape that you love on me, even the color. I can see us at our favorite restaurant, in that quiet little booth in the corner, all cuddled up, enjoying our meal and our time together. Unfortunately, you turned into one of ‘those’ guys. The controlling type that likes to tell women what to do and where to go, and I’m just not for that. So to answer your text from last night: No we’re never ever ever getting back together. To cement that answer, enclosed in this envelope you will find a picture of me in the dress, on a date with my new boyfriend. Enjoy. With All My Heart, your loving and now happy Ex-girlfriend. This dress features a sweetheart neckline, zipper and fish hook in the back and visible stitching along bust and bottom. Also features adjustable sash tie around arms, full lining and a structured bodice. Model is wearing a small. • 95% Polyester 5% Spandex • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Made in the

core.name: Make A Statement Red Lace Dress
description: How do you gain the attention of an entire room? The banging of a loud gavel would do it, sure, but how polite is that? Not at all. Screaming? Sure it would work but it would panic everyone and the screaming would pretty much be everything you would accomplish. Slowly descend a Cinderella staircase while clad in a gorgeous dress? Yup, that's the ticket! That's the best way to Make A Statement and make it stick! Mid-length dress features a lace up peek-a-boo front and an exposed back zipper with hook and eye closure. core.name: Lady Of Class Red Skater Dress
description: A Lady of Class is a great many things; an excellent judge of character, a poised and elegant woman of intelligence, a smart, judicial, shrewd gal who knows how to get what she wants, but above all else, she knows when to say something and when to say nothing at all. In other words, she knows when to let her wardrobe do all the talking for her. This dress says volumes, and we'll leave it up to you, what you want it say and to whom you would like it to speak. We hear it works wonders on ex-husbands and current mother-in-laws. Dress features scoop neckline, hidden back zipper, lace arm detail. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Imported

title: Lady Of Class Red Skater Dress

core.name: Relish The Moment Red Embroidered Dress
description: The thing about moments is that they're fleeting. They're there one moment, gone the next. Most of the time, you don't even realize you missed a moment until it's already over with. Our solution, Relish The Moment by celebrating it in this gorgeous Embroidered Dress. Why is clothing important? Because it's memorable. It adds to the moment and it helps you to slow down and realize how special the moment is before it passes you by. So if anything, we're doing you a huge favor by making you take stock of what really matters. Who knew fashion could do something so meaningful? We did. We totally did. Red sun dress features a flowy, drop waist silhouette with an asymmetrical hemline, keyhole opening in front, exposed zipped in back, and colorful flower embroidery throughout the front and back. Model is wearing a small. • 65% Cotton 35% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Imported

core.name: Matters Of The Heart Red Maxi Dress
description: When it comes to Matters Of The Heart, a woman really needs to be careful. We're not saying to lock it away in a glass box and only bring it out on special occasions or when company comes over or anything, but the heart is a fragile thing (and a surprisingly strong thing when it needs to be, which sounds like a paradox, but it isn't). So in the care and feeding of the heart, one needs to treat it to special things now and then, and when the heart has a sudden urge, a want or longing, we find it's best to give in and splurge now and then. Like if your heart wants this maxi dress, for example (just saying). Elegant red dress features a plunging V neck on a fitted, ruching bodice, adjustable criss cross spaghetti straps, chiffon overlay, and double slit skirt with an invisible zipper closure in back. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

core.name: Escape To Mexico Red Off-The-Shoulder Dress
description: Craving a jalapeno margarita? Some real salsa and chips (amongst more food and drinks that I can't even begin to list because I will wind up hungry for the next gazillion years until I can scrounge up enough money for a plane ticket to go to Mexico myself)? Well, if you're like me and you can't afford to just fly to Mexico, or charter a private jet (dream big or go home, right?) then enjoy the warmer climes of Summer in this Escape To Mexico Red Off The Shoulder Dress. It's Beautiful, breathlessly embroidered, and gives the most exotic vibe! It won't make the guacamole for you, but it's a great addition for your very own Mexican Night if you wanted to host one. Even if you were the only one in attendance. And no, we totally wouldn't judge. Not even a little bit. Though ... if you want to invite us, we would at least consider coming. Off the shoulder embroidered dress features an a-line silhouette with an elasticized neckline and short sleeves. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Cotton •
